intropage.preamble:
You have reached the logically existing, virtual ACE+TAO scoreboard. It shows all the OS/compiler combinations ACE+TAO are tested against everyday, all over the world. We have builds running continuously at ISIS, Vanderbilt University, Washington University, St. Louis, University of California,Irvine, Automated Trading Desk, LMCO-ATL, University of Maryland, Carlos O'Ryan, John Zorko, Remedy IT, Hunleth.com, Riverace Corporation, Qualcomm, Virtual Reality Applications Center, J.T. Conklin, Object Computing Inc, Hewlett-Packard, PrismTech, and DRE Systems.
The distributed scoreboard is divided into following five categories:
ACE Builds for Beta/Release
ACE Builds not for Beta/Release
TAO Builds for Beta/Release
TAO Builds not for Beta/Release
Miscellaneous Builds
Integrated page having all the above in a single page for folks who like it!
ACE+TAO Subsetting Builds
Skoll -- Distributed Continuous Quality Assurance
If you'd like to contribute builds to our virtual scoreboard please contact us and let us know which platform combinations you can contribute. Instructions for setting up your own daily build and scoreboard are available here.
We use the daily builds as a basis to collect important metrics like compilation time, footprint and performance details. Please refer to this page for more details.
